ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The manuscript and studies concerning anticancer influence of polyphenols of olive oil were funded by the MN grant No. 01-0276/08/259 from Medical University of Gdansk (Gdansk, Poland) and Polish Ministry of Science and Higher Education. The authors kindly thank Prof. Stephan Nussberger (Institute of Biomaterials and Biomolecular Systems, Department of Biophysics, University of Stuttgart, Stuttgart, Germany) for his valuable comments on our article.
